summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eighth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Forty-fifth Street to East Forty-seventh Street, by laying water mains and constructing sewers and other appurtenances therein, in accordance with Majority Petition therefor, being File No. 31827 of the Records of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
